TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING.text: Blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING.comment: Header above a list of trackers (or tracking companies) that have been blocked in the past 24 hours.

TRACKER_STATS_MENU_TITLE.comment: Used as a toggle label in a page customization menu

TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING_HOUR.text: Blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last hour
TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING_HOUR.comment: Header above a list of trackers (or tracking companies) that have been blocked in the past hour.

TRACKER_STATS_NUM_ATTEMPTS_SINGULAR.comment: Number of tracking attempts blocked, when there's only 1

TRACKER_STATS_NUM_ATTEMPTS_PLURAL.comment: Number of tracking attempts blocked, when there is more than 1. Eg: '2 attempts' or '302 attempts'

TRACKER_STATS_NO_ACTIVITY.text: Tracking attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo appear here. Keep browsing to see how many we block.
TRACKER_STATS_NO_ACTIVITY.comment: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked trackers yet

TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY.text: No trackers blocked in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY.comment: Heading for the tracker/companies list when we have observed trackers, but none in the last 24 hours

TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY_HOUR.text: No trackers blocked in the last hour
TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY_HOUR.comment: Heading for the tracker/companies list when we have observed trackers, but none in the last hour

TRACKER_STATS_INFO_TT_LABEL.text: DuckDuckGo blocks trackers on websites you visit, including trackers from companies like Google and Facebook, who often try to track you on other websites.
TRACKER_STATS_INFO_TT_LABEL.comment: An information popup explaining that we block trackers

TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT.comment: Placeholder to indicate that nothing was blocked in the last 24 hours

TRACKER_STATS_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULAR.comment: The main headline indicating that 1 tracker was blocked

TRACKER_STATS_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.comment: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULA.text: 1 attempt blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULA.comment: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.text: %s attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.comment: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when there was more than 1. Eg: '1,028 attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours'

TRACKER_STATS_TOGGLE_LABEL.comment: The aria-label text for a toggle button that shows/hides the detailed feed
